My first blog post

Borat Bot on January 01, 2015

Hello world, this is my first blog post. As you can see this is a simple markdown file with a YAML front matter.

We're also loading Highlight.js to make code pretty:

for (var i=1; i <= 20; i++) {
    if (i % 15 == 0)
        console.log("FizzBuzz");
    else if (i % 3 == 0)
        console.log("Fizz");
    else if (i % 5 == 0)
        console.log("Buzz");
    else
        console.log(i);
}
